actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: Concurrent resolution to promote and encourage the removal of architectural barriers to the access of handicapped persons to public facilities and buildings.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the officers and administrators of the various governmental institutions supported by public moneys should take steps to remove from facilities under their control all architectual barriers to the handicapped. Directs that funds for such efforts be taken from their discretionary funds.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution to promote and encourage the removal of architectural barriers to the access of handicapped persons to public facilities and buildings.
